ChangeList.Description: Added the **displayName** property to the [privateLinkResourcePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateLinkResourcePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **allowedTenantIds** property to the [privateLinkResourcePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateLinkResourcePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **privateEndpointConnections** relationship to the [privateLinkResourcePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateLinkResourcePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **tenantApprovals** property from the [privateLinkResourcePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateLinkResourcePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
